LanguageData.VWE_Apparel_Exoframe.label: exoskeleton frame
LanguageData.VWE_Apparel_Exoframe.description: A wearable frame, powered by a system of hydraulics, electric motors, levers and pneumatics, designed to permit quick movement. Whilst it does not provide any protection, it allows the user to walk faster, lift heavier objects and maintain balance more easily.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Autocannon.label: autocannon
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Autocannon.description:
A self-loading large-bore cannon. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges. It's slow to aim and it cannot fire at close-up targets.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Autocannon.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Autocannon.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HandheldMortar.label: handheld mortar
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HandheldMortar.description:
Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged. It's slow to aim and it cannot fire at close-up targets.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.

LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HandheldMortar.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HeavyFlamer.label: heavy flamer
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HeavyFlamer.description:
A powerful, military-grade flamer based on mechanoid inferno spewers. It can cover the entire area in front of the user in flames.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.

LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SwarmMissileLauncher.label: swarm missile launcher
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SwarmMissileLauncher.description:
A rocket launcher that fires eight small-bore explosive missiles that track different targets.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_SwarmRocket.label: swarm rocket
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_UraniumSlugRifle.label: uranium slug rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_UraniumSlugRifle.description:
A self-loading uranium slug cannon. Its ultra-dense uranium shells can punch through heavy armor. It's more accurate at longer ranges, and can't fire at all close up.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has limited number of uses.
